sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>rocket</radical> <radical>turkey</radical> has several points which will <kanji>detach</kanji> during takeoff.
meaningInfo: Imagine the rocket turkey taking off. Just like a regular rocket, as it goes up, used pieces of the turkey rocket detach and fall back to the ground.
readingMnemonic: When the rocket turkey parts <kanji>detach</kanji>, they fall to the ground onto a bed of <reading>ree</reading>ds (<ja>り</ja>).
readingInfo: The reeds catch on fire - probably best not to fire off turkey rockets so close to these fields of reeds. Imagine the launch site completely surrounded by reeds.
